casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald U. FULLARD. No. 42P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Reginald Fullard, Polkton, for Fullard, Reginald U. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of April 2015 by Defendant for Appeal Orders Entered 15 April 2015:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
